content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction area at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)

### Iron gear wheel crafting area
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft an item. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
